fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, kill a Noble, negating their abilities as long as they are dead. This ability is usable until Night 2.
- At night, instead of killing a Noble, you can target 2 players to deal a basic attack to.
- At night, instead of killing a Noble, you can instead target yourself to give yourself basic protection.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, start with 4 "Nobles", which are all unique and have different passive effects:
1. Lennox - Every 3 nights, Lennox will deal a basic attack to Macbeth
2. Duncan - Macbeth has to wait a night after using any abilities
3. Banquo - A random noble will come back to life whenever an evil is hung
4. Macduff - Macbeth will appear as evil
- Only Macbeth from famous play "macbeth" will know about the Nobles
